proxyEnabled.description: Button text when proxy is enabled

proxyDisabled.description: Button text when proxy is disabled

reloadHint.description: Hint to reload Twitch after changing settings

useCustomProxy.description: Checkbox label for using custom proxy

errorSavingSettings.description: Error message when settings cannot be saved

errorLoadingSettings.description: Error message when settings cannot be loaded

errorInitializingSettings.description: Error message when settings cannot be initialized

errorApplyingProxySettings.description: Error message when proxy settings cannot be applied

errorClearingProxySettings.description: Error message when proxy settings cannot be cleared

proxySettingsApplied.description: Success message when proxy settings are applied

proxySettingsCleared.description: Success message when proxy settings are cleared
